summary: This is an email chain regarding witness preparation for the USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (20 CR 330). An AT&T Court Appearance Team member contacts a recipient about a witness located in Suffern, NY, and offers to schedule a prep call. The forwarding email suggests discussing stipulations on an upcoming conferral call.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case referenced in the email subject line (USA V GHISLAINE MAXWELL 20 CR 330).

events.title: Email regarding witness preparation
events.description: An AT&T Court Appearance Team member emails regarding a witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell case, offering to schedule a preparation call prior to the witness's court appearance.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain related to the criminal case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (docket 20 CR 330).
A witness for the case is located in Suffern, New York.
The AT&T Court Appearance Team is involved in facilitating witness preparation for a court appearance.
The forwarding email mentions raising 'stips' (likely stipulations) on a conferral call later that day.
